name: Cosmic Purge
description:
Key features
- Single player
- Action FPS
- Cosmic Horror, Dark Fantasy
- Game has 3D stylized art
- Lots of shooting enemies
- Power Punch has a cooldown and it heals
- 4 levels, yard and mansion three floors
- Checkpoints

Gameplay
In this FPS the player moves through unique environments killing enemies, while trying to destroy Spawners from which they emerge. Different weapons are used to kill enemies and enemies drop ammo for the player. Ammo drops are randomized. Player is goal is to reach the top floor to kill the boss of the game.

Story
The bounty hunter Cassius has an arsenal of weapons and has been sent on a mission to purge the corruption from a mansion in this cosmic horror inspired FPS game.

In an alternative universe a cosmic creature from vast space appeared before humanity. This being granted its power to mankind, and quickly became a god to them. What we knew as the industrial revolution came to be known as the golden era.

Unfortunately their god wasn't so benevolent. After 200 hundred years, corruption started to spread and consume every living thing on its path. In this new age humanity, now on the brink of extinction, formed a new organization to fight back against this plaque of destruction.
